resources.string:
How to help: 


Loosen tight clothing, especially around the neck

Protect the person from injury by removing objects within reach

Cushion or support person's head

Once convulsions have stopped, place the person in the recovery position
 

 Don't:


Restrict or restrain the person's movements

Put anything in the person's mouth

Feed the person or give her/him beverages

Try to move her/him (only do so if they are in danger)
